Module count
Package count.ds

Class TreeTraversal.WellIndexed

java.lang.Object
count.ds.TreeTraversal.WellIndexed
All Implemented Interfaces:
IndexedTree
Enclosing class:
TreeTraversal
public static class TreeTraversal.WellIndexed
extends Object
implements IndexedTree
Adapter for any indexed tree to respect the leaves-first order. Our indexing is based on postorder: leaves first, and children have lower indices than the parents.
Author:
csuros

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
